title: HELP!
body: After locking in and going in to a game my game crashes and says client and server version mismatch any suggestions?

replies.body:
A version mismatch error generally happens when something went wrong during the last patching process. I recommend either running the repair *Wolfess* mentioned, or grabbing the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and **Forcing a repatch**.

Let me know if you still see issues.

I'd say try repairing your client with the repair option, that way it re-checks the files on your computer against the ones for the server.

note, however, that this MAY be a lengthy process.
